metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20810 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low.
metadata.Description:
go7007_snd_init in drivers/media/usb/go7007/snd-go7007.c in the Linux kernel before 5.6 does not call snd_card_free for a failure path, which causes a memory leak, aka CID-9453264ef586. Chuhong Yuan discovered that go7007 USB audio device driver in the Linux kernel did not properly deallocate memory in some failure conditions. A physically proximate attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (memory exhaustion).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20810` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-45-generic - 5.4.0-45.49
linux-image-5.4.0-45-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-45.49
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-45-generic - 5.4.0-45.49
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-45-lowlatency - 5.4.0-45.49
No subscription required

linux-image-5.4.0-1022-aws - 5.4.0-1022.22
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1023-azure - 5.4.0-1023.23
No subscription required

No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-45.49').
linux-aws package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1022.22').
linux-azure package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1023.23').
linux-gcp package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1022.22').
linux-kvm package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1021.21').
linux-oem-5.6 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.6.0-1007.7').
linux-oracle package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1022.22').
linux-raspi package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1016.17').
linux-raspi2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life, was needs-triage').
linux-signed package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-45.49').
